import React from 'react' import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; const Home = () => ( {/* This container which will contain services in circular cards with a logo symbolizing what kind of services aka 'Social Proof'*/} Service 1 Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Service 2 Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Service 3 Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. {/* Benefits container. "What can we do for you?" */} Service 1 We create unique experiences. Service 2 Feel the music and turn your social gatherings into more than just the typical meet-up occasion. Service 3 We are not your ordinary bluetooth speaker or sound bar playing through your phone.
{/* Features container. How can we do it for you?*/} {/* This container will have 4 equal sized pictures that are clickable with text inside saying what it will direct you to: reservations, our tech, about us, contact us */}

{' '} We use modern-day tech and equipment that is suited to your needs and expectations. Our equipments primarily consists of PA speakers, subwoofers, both wired and wireless microphones, mixers to help amplify and control the sound, and a DJ controller for that overall music experience. {' '}

Pioneer text QSC text Turbosound text Mackie text Shure text Sennheiser text {/* Call to Action Container */} If you are a performer or DJ, weâ€™d love to assist and get in contact with you! Please contact us Don't forget to check us out on Yelp! {/* This container will be about how we run on multiple platforms such as youtube and spotify for you to listen to music and get in touch with our genre and curations. */} I like music. Do you like music? Here are our youtube and spotify channels. :) ); export default Home;
